attributes.action: overr charging of student accommodation in Sheffield by Phoenix Court Northern Guinness Housing Association
attributes.additional_details:
HON SIR
i WAS A STUDENT WITH SHU FOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT COURSE 2011-2012.
I HAD PAID FULL RENT IN GOOD FAITH THROUGH REMMITTANCES BY OF LOAN FROM BANK OF INDIA.
AFTER MY RETURN I WAS SENT AN LETTER BY THE RECOVERY TEAM OF THE PAYMENT OF ARREARS.
I WAS ASKED TO PAY THE SAME BY WAY OF INSTALLMENTS & WITH AN OFFER OF 25% REBATE.
WHEN I REVERTED BACK WITH THE DETAILS THEY ARE NOW CONTRADICTING THAT THE OFFER WAS FOR AN NEW STUDENT NOT ME I HAVE THOSE REF COPIES WITH ME.
THE CASE IS CLEAR IF AN DEFAULTER IS OFFERED 25% REBAT THEN ITS AUTOMATICALLY PROVED THAT FOREIGN STUDENTS ARE FLEECED BY WAY OF SUCH TACTICS & OVERCHARGING.
ADDRESS WHILE STAY - 76.1 PHOENIX COURT 133 ROCKINGHAM STREET PC S14EE SHEFFIELD U.K.
I WANT REPAYMENT OF EXCESS CHARGED, COMPENSATION FOR WRONG MAILS FOR RECOVERY, ETC STRICT ACTION AGAINST THEM
